narrative.narrative: Xtra Airways is a charter airline based in Boise,Idaho and has a hub at San Antonio,Texas. It does not limit its service to the US and is even approved to fly domestic service in Chile. It operates in the Caribbean,Mexico,Canada,and Central and South America besides the US, which includes Alaska. Currently it has 4 737-400's as of November 2014. One is based at San Antonio,one at Miami,one at Pittsburgh and one at Baltimore. It was founded in 1987 and started operations in 1989 as Casino Express Airlines and operated out of Elko,Nevada using a 737-200. A few years later it got another one. From 1999-2005 it had 3 737-200 Adv.'s and have leased 737-800's and at least one 300 for short times. It changed its name in 2005 to reflect that it serves much more than casino vacationers.
